1.content:
Here are your options:

Option 1: Choose from 1 of 5 families in which the babies or toddlers become giants or the adults and older kids shrink.

Option 2: Choose from 1 of 5 giant babies who do whatever they want.

Option 3: Choose from 1 of 5 scenarios in which babies and toddlers begin to take over the world.

You can do whatever you want with the last 2 options!
1.title: The Beginning

11.content:
Here are the families to choose from:

1. Parents John and Mary, 15-year-old son Mike, and 2-year-old twins Hunter and Timmy.

2. Parents Adam and Martha, 17-year-old son James, 14-year-old daughter Emily, and 1-year-old son Matt.

3. Single mother Stacey, 18-year-old son Wayne, and 11-month-old daughter Suzy.

4. Parents Burt and Cora, 18-year-old daughter Eliza, 10-year-old son Jake, 3-year-old son Dominic, and 1-year-old daughter Ella.

5. Parents Douglas and Ellen, 16-year-old twins Jack and Molly, and 2-year-old son Eddy.
11.title: Option 1

111.content: Who's POV do you follow?
111.title: Family 1

choices: Hunter and Timmy came in and were taller than her
She heard Hunter and Timmy giggling much louder than usual
11112.content: It all began one night when Mary was making pasta with meatballs for dinner. Her husband, John, was on a business trip, and her teenaged son Mike was at summer camp, so it was just her and her twin toddlers Hunter and Timmy in the house. She had just put the pasta on to boil, when all of a sudden....
11112.title: Mary

choices: A woman gave us something to drink.
111121.content: She looks around the room and is stunned as her sons walked into the room, but they were taller than her! Their diapers were full too. "Hi little mommy" Hunter says as he walks over to her. His diaper smell was bad! "H-h-how did you two get s-s-so b-b-big" She asked. "Well mommy..." Timmy began to say.
111121.title: Hunter and Timmy came in and were taller than her

choices: Hunter came over with a strange ray gun
Timmy came in with a magic wand
He heard something crash through the ceiling
1112.content: 15-year-old Mike was babysitting his 2-year-old twin brothers Hunter and Timmy while his parents where at a party. He was preparing some oatmeal for them, when suddenly....
1112.title: Mike?

choices: Stuffs your 6-inch form into his diaper front
Carries you back to where Hunter was waiting with more magic stuff!
11122.content:
As you turn from the kitchen counter, you see your baby brother Timmy come waddling in . . . waving what looked like a magician's magic wand carved from wood.

"Now where did you find that Timmy?" you ask, genuinely curious.

"Hunter and I found it in an old trunk that belonged to Great Grandpa," Timmy explained as he waved the want about, making little sparkles pop from it's end.

You remember how your Great Grandfather had been a world renown magician in his day . . . doing tricks and things that nobody could ever figure out, not even those know-it-all experts on the tv that made their living out of explaining illusions and such. Most thought the old man was simply a head of his time . . . but you sometimes wondered . . .

"Well, better put it up for now, it's time for breakfast," you say heartily.

But Timmy didn't look ready to stop.

"Time for that later . . . wanna play now!" And before you could argue, Timmy waved the wand in a peculiar yet familiar movement and then burbled some strange nonsense words . . . and a flash erupted from the wand's tip!

You suddenly fell dizzy . . . like the time you road the Tower of Terror ride at Disney! Everything was rising up and you had to close your eyes to keep from getting nausiated.

When you opened your eyes again . . . everything was Giant! Including Timmy!

The towering tot holsters the wand through the side of this diaper and then bends down and grabs you!

he then . . .
11122.title: Timmy came in with a magic wand

choices: If that shrinks people I wonder if we can grow
111222.content: Timmy carries you back towards the giant closet upstairs. His pudgy hands were warm around your body and you were actually comfortable even if it was super scary to be this small. Timmy enters the room where you brother Hunter was going though a big chest that your great grandpa used to use. You remember seeing a video of him shrinking his assistant just like Timmy had shrunk you, that assistant was your great grandmother. Timmy walks up to Hunter and says. "look I made our big brother our little brother". Hunter turns around and looks at you in Timmy's hand and says...
111222.title: Carries you back to where Hunter was waiting wi...

choices: They pull out some more magic items
They start to use their diapers!
1112221.content:
Timmy holds you up for Hunter to see.

"Wow! Ol' Great Grandpa's magic stuff really works! Just like the book said!" Hunter bounces on his heels with excitement . . . the you notice a thick old leather bound book that was lying open on the floor.

"Let's see what else we can do with this stuff!" Timmy giggles.

You squirm like a worm, but Timmy clamps a chubby hand over you mouth. "Quiet, Little Brother! No talking during the show, eh"

Both tots bust out laughing as they look through the trunk again.

"Hey," Hunter calls, "This should keep him from fussing!" He pulls out a length of chain and begins reading the instructions in the book.

"Aren't they a little big to bind him?"

"Not if I get this right." Hunter then babbled a bit of dribble sounding mumbo-jumbo . . . and the chain began to move and shimmer! Striking like a chain, it lashes you out of Timmy's hands and proceeds to resize and shackle you up from neck to ankles!

"There! Now we can work hands free, ha ha"

As you lie on the carpet, helpless, the boys dig through the steamer trunk again.
1112221.title: I wanna see him

11122211.content: What do they pull out?!
11122211.title: They pull out some more magic items

choices: A lamp that looks like the one from Aladdin
111222112.content: What else could the two tots pull out?
111222112.title: something else

choices: One of them is pooping themselves
11122212.content:
As the boys are digging, you hear the all too familiar sounds of breaking wind!

You look and see . . .
11122212.title: They start to use their diapers!

111222121.title: One of them is pooping themselves

1112221211.content:
As you lie on the floor bound in the magic chains watching your giant baby brothers dig through the old magic chest/trunk . . . there comes a loud wet fart from Timmy's back end!

You cringe at the smell as it's blown right in your direction!

"Oh! Man! Timmy what has Mom been feeding you?!"

But then Timmy's diaper starts to bulge and sag as he unloads into it!

"Must be all that mush she keeps stuffing us with in the morning, hee hee!"

He squats right down next you and blows another hot one before dumping the rest, making his diaper seem more like a sack of fertilizer just inches from your face!

"Well I guess we better unbind Mike so he can change me."

"No wait!" Hunter says, grasping his brother's chubby hand, "Let's try use some of Great Grandpa's magic!"

What do they try?!
1112221211.title: Timmy

112.content: Who's POV do you want to follow?
112.title: Family 2

113.content: Who's POV do you want to follow?
113.title: Family 3

choices: Her crying, she must need a diaper change
She wasn't doing anything you go to investigate
1132.content: You are Wayne! You are 18 years old and have jet black hair and a nice muscle build. You live at home with your mom Stacey who is 36 and your little sister Suzy who is 11 months old and really smart for her age. She has already learned to walk and talk like a 3 year old. Your mom was out at work for the day and asked you to watch your little sister for a bit. When she left Suzy was asleep. After your mom left you heard some noises coming from Suzy's room followed by...
1132.title: Wayne

choices: She found a ray gun at some point
11321.content:
Wayne hears Suzy giggling at something, but her voice seemed a bit too loud for some reason. Opening her bedroom door, his eyes go wide in shock, as his baby sister is sitting in her room, the top of her head brushing the ceiling. The crib she was lying in was completely destroyed after she outgew it and was in pieces all around the room.

"Suzy?? What happened to you?!"

"Hi, big bruvva," the toddler replies, smiling down at him. "I got bigger!"

"I can see that. But how??"

Unbeknownst to Wayne, Suzy is able to grow because...
11321.title: Her giggling, quite loudly

choices: Suzy sees a baby in a stroller nearby
113211.content:
Suzy giggled at her now tiny brother. "I grow again! Watch!" Closing her eyes in concentration, Wayne watched his baby sister's body become larger. Her head hit the ceiling and before long, cracks started to form in the walls.

"Suzy, stop it! You're destroying the house !"

Ignoring her brother, Suzy continued growing, using her arms to push through the ceiling. Fearing for his life, Wayne ran down the stairs and outside, where he watched the toddler force her way out of the house, landing with a thud in the front yard and continuing to grow. Eventually, she was the same height as their 2 story, partially destroyed house while sitting down and decided to stop for the moment.

Wayne slowly approached, unsure what to do next and still a little unclear on how Suzy was able to grow so large in the first place. He stopped by one of her massive feet, when she spoke.

"Wanna pway!"
113211.title: She can grow at will

1132111.content: Wayne just looked up in awe, not that long ago he was just babysitting his 11 month old smart sister, now she tore through their house which she now towered over, only slightly. "I'm da biggester peson in da whole wide world!" said Suzy happily and loudly. Luckily for Wayne and Suzy to some extant, it was late at night and no one could see Suzy which gave their neighbors no clue what was going on. "S-S-Suzy. Please you gotta be quiet...pleas" begged Wayne running toward her trying to reason with his giant baby sister. "No, I wanna pway! I wanna pway now!" said Suzy demanding to do what she wanted. In response Suzy smiled and picked her brother up by his leg, raising him so they were eye to eye regardless of him being upside down. "Will you pway with me bruver?" asked. "I-I...I uhhh...i don't..." Said Wayne not knowing what to say. His hesitation angered Suzy who's face went from happy lily nice to angry and stubborn. She growled and looked really mad at Wayne. "Pway with me! Pway with me! Pway with me! PWAY! WITH! MEEEEE!!!!" Se said shaking Wayne in anger demanding he comply.
1132111.title: Suzy picks Wayne up

choices: He tries running away from her
11321111.content: Knowing that her temper tantrum will not make any progress but could actually cause damage, Wayne knew what he had to do. "Ok, ok, ok. I promise to play with you. I promise to do whatever you want and whatever say" said Wayne trying to appease his sister. "Yaaaaayy! Tanks bruver" sad Suzy with glee who stopped shaking him and had a happier expression on her face. "I promise only if you become smaller. Please. Be smaller again" he said begging his giant sister. Suz responded with an mad look on her face. "Please! Everyone would be happy, if you could be small like before" he said. She responded to that with an angrier expression on her face. "Please!" he said. Her face became furious just like before in response to that statement. "It'll be easier that way. I mean all the toys are too small. You can't fit in the house. There's no big bed. It'll be fun for you too" he said trying to reason with her. Her expression went from anger to patience. "Ok, I promise to be small again" she said. "Great, just put things back to normal, we'll play a little then I'll tuck you in bed and..." He said overjoyed that his sister agreed only to be cut off. "NO! I bigger now. I bigger dan you and mommy from now on!" she said interrupting him stating her demands. That would be very strange even for him, but given his current circumstance he had no choice. "Deal. You can be bigger. And if you wanna be small like before again you can still do that" he said. "Ok" she said happily with a smile. She then dropped Wayne from the air to the ground like a rag doll. But reduced her size to regular original height. "Let's pway" said Suzy
11321111.title: Wayne said yes

113211111.content: Awestricken that he had managed to convince his sister to shrink down to normal height Wayne just stood there dumbfounded that he was able to convince Suzy to shrink back, but knowing that she has the run of the place he doesn't know what he's gotten himself into. "Wet's go! I wanna pway!" Said Suzy throwing a tantrum growing a little. "S-S-Sure. Whatever you say. Lil sis" he said still trying to appease her. "Nuh-uh. I am not da wittle one any more. Now I da big sister. You da lil bruver now!" said Suzy as she grew once more but only till she was big enough to tower over Wayne but small enough to still fit in their damaged house. "You gonna be good or bad?" she said towering over him.
113211111.title: He keeps his promise

1132111111.content:
"I'm good, I'm gonna be really good Suzy. You're the big one, I'm the little one" he answered insticevly. "Yes you are. You good lil bruver" she said smiling patting his head. She then reduced her size and picked Wayne up. "Wh-What are you doing? I said I'll be good!" said Wayne screaming with fear. "I know, and cuz you knot bad, you don't get to go in my giant poopy diapy" said Suzy as she grabbed it's wasteband and showed Wayne that. "If you bad, you go in. But you good. No stinky diapy now" she said. Wayne felt relieved he didn't get to endure that experience but still worried what would happen.


"Stay here Bruver" said Suzy as she put him down. He then stood his ground and watched his giant sized 11 month old smart sister look around their house for something. He noticed that somethings she grabbed were hers others were furniture that were originall to big for her or even him to carry. When she was done she had, multiple baby stuff that he and their mom always used on her when they were taking care of her. The variety varied from her dresses, her shirts, her diapers, her changing table, her spare crib, baby food, baby bottles, and even her toys. Now they were way to small for them to fit and wondered why she'd even bothered. But at that moment Wayne was in even deeper shock as he witnessed all the clothes, food, and furniture had now grown to be fitted for a baby that was her size. "Suzy? H-How did...how did you..?" Said Wayne unable to even ask the question. "Tee hee, I can make my clothes and diapies big silly. I can make utter tings grow too" she answered. Suzy was now over 8 feet tall and all the things she had enlarged were now perfectly suited for her. Only she had other plans.


"I am now da big sister. I bigger dan you now. I da babysitter you da baby" she said. "What? Suzy, you're the big sister. You're the tall one. I'm still older, you can't just treat me like that" said Wayne. "You promised to do everything I say. I say I da babysitter an da big sister. You do lil bruver dat need a diapy for pee an poopoo" said Suzy. She then approached Wayne who backed away slowly only for it to lead to no where. "Suzy? Suzy! Come on, let's not be too...hasty?" said Wayne as he was lifted off again by Suzy who treated him like a rag doll.


She began by Pulling his shoes and socks off. She then pushed him into the floor to take off his pants which were more difficult leading her to eventually ripping them off. She the moved forward to taking his jacket off and then whipping him around by his t-shirt till it was off too. Finally she yanked off his underwear leaving him entirely naked and lying on the floor worn out tired. "Hahaha. Day was fun. And now you nakey. You need diapy now!" she said. As she used her power to enlarge one of her pink diapers and powders. She powdered him and then fastened the diaper on Wayne followed by another one so it was bulky and to top it off she fastened a baby bonnet on his head. "Dare you go. Now you are da baby bruver" she said smiling with pride. "Don't you like it?" She asked. Wayne looked down in humilation and blushed at his attire. "Suzy can I please have my-" said Wayne before she shoved a giant pacifier into his mouth. "Hahahaha, hush now baby bruver an suck your Paci" she said. She then picked him up and placed him in a large crib.
1132111111.title: Wayne answers yes (good)

choices: He had to be punished for trying to run
She would forgive him, and just play with him
113211112.content:
The teen looked down at his year-old sister, and suddenly began to feel afraid. She had a strange kind of power, and he did not know how she had gotten it or what its limits were. Her ability to grow in size scared him, and he was gripped with a fear that made him want to flee.

And so he did, turning and running away. Upon taking the first step, though, he heard a shout from behind, which quickly grew louder and deeper, but still remained recognizable as the voice of his baby sister. The teen froze up and turned around, and saw Suzy looming over him, eyes narrowed and brow furrowed.

"Don't wun, bruver!" she said sternly. "I said I wanna pway! So don't wun!"

Wayne remained frozen as he looked up at his gigantic sister, and did not move as she reached down for him. Her pudgy baby fingers wrapped tightly around his torso and lifted him up off the ground, up two stories to her face. He squirmed against her grasp, but she just giggled loudly.

"Dat tickles!" she cried. "Tickle!"

Suzy continued to giggle as Wayne finally gave up struggling. He looked sadly into her eyes, hoping she would not hurt him in revenge for his attempt to run away.

The giant baby looked at the boy held in her hand, and after a bit of thought, made up her mind about what to do with him.
113211112.title: He tries running away from her

choices: Suzy gives Wayne a time out
1132111121.content:
"Her-Hee. Naughty naughty little bruver. You run away" said Suzy. "I..i..um..." said Wayne completely speechless and intimidated. "You were baaaaad" said Suzy. Wayne just continued to be speechless as he realized the gravity of the situation. After a moments thought he finally figured out what to say "Suzy...I'm please you see I uh...i" said Wayne muttering. Suzy then loosened her grip and then let Wayne slide a little until she was holding him upside down. And said "uh-uh-uhhh" mere inches from his face. "You pwomised to play wiff me, and den you run away. You bad. Bad bad bad". Wayne then spoke up "please you were scaring me. I mean I don't see my little sister this big or..." before he was cut off.

In his absolute fear Wayne forgot the role he was supposed to play, which got him into deeper trouble. "BAD! You even badder than before! I da BIG SISTER NOW!!! I big you liddle. You not big anymore. And you no play wif me" said Suzy. "I'm sorry. I'm sorry" said Wayne. "Nuh-uh. You sink I'm liddle. I not liddle. I big now" said Suzy. "That's right. I'm sorry. You're big now" said Wayne. "Yes I am. But you still badder. And badder boys get in trouble" said Suzy.
1132111121.title: He had to be punished for trying to run

choices: A neighbor pops in to check on them and gets a surprise
113212.content:
Unbeknownst to Wayne, Suzy is able to grow because...
She found a ray gun at some point


"Me no know me just find strange new twoy. Twoy make weird light then Suzy feel good but weird. Me pway with twoy a few times then nuffin happen. Me then get weird and good feeling during nap. I wake up and me suddenly start getting bigger. 1st time me get almost as big as bed. Me sit and look around for awhile. I try to sweep some more but strange feeling return and me get bigger again too big for bed. I went to pick up new twoy but weird light come out and twoy bwake"


Wayne saw a toy gun near the enlarged Suzy. He picked it up and found several cracks in it.



The trigger was also busted.
He notices what appears to be a dial with settings.
Oddly tho the dial just has 3 different size dots •

one tiny one average size and one really big


The dial was set to the biggest dot.
There was also a switch but Wayne couldn't read it since it was busted.


Wayne surmised that Suzy's increased size and mass boosted her strength and that she didn't know her own strength thus breaking what had to be a size device. Wayne feared what if Suzy weren't done growing.


Wayne was about to decide what to do next when______
113212.title: She found a ray gun at some point

114.content: Who's POV do you want to follow?
114.title: Family 4

115.content: Who's POV do you want to follow?
115.title: Family 5

1151.content: Who's POV do you follow?
1151.title: Douglas or Ellen?

choices: Taking Eddy out in the stroller
11512.content: Where is Ellen when the story begins?
11512.title: Ellen

115121.content: What is she doing at home?
115121.title: At home

choices: Your baby boy is aiming his new Body Alteration gun at you . . .
Your baby boy is not quite so little anymore!!
1151211.content:
You are Ellen, woman of the house and mother to Jack, Molly, and little Eddy.

You come from a long line of science geniuses, and deep down you know your kids will all aspire to great things.

But you have no idea that your baby boy might in fact be an early bloomer and already possess remarkable intellect and skill . . . or a rather mature mischievous mind.

You are alone in the manor house today. Your husband is away at the office and might not be back till late. The twins, Jack and Molly are off for summer vacation and are spending the day at friends' houses.

As you are going up to the nursery to check on Eddy, you hear rather hearty chuckling and giggling coming from the room and you notice sparks and flashes underneath the closed door.

Curious and concerned you go in to discover . . .
1151211.title: About to go diaper Eddy

choices: goes ahead and demonstrates another program for his gun
puts you in his personally made Doll House
11512111.content:
Seeing the elaborate looking thing in your baby boy's hands, you immediately see it as little more than a fancy toy gun . . . possibly one of the twin's old ones from when they were younger.

"Now what is Mommy's little man doing with that," you ask with a big amused smile.

And to your surprise, Eddy answers with a cocked-brow grin.

"Getting a new doll to play with, that's what!"

He pushes several buttons on the gun's controls and then pulls the trigger.

In a dazzling flash, your body is suddenly covered in near blinding lights! You begin to feel light headed all of a sudden as the room seems to spin.

As your vision starts to clear, a loud thump and a metallic latch brings you back to your senses as you turn around . . . and find yourself staring up at a now giant size Eddy! You barely come up to his diaper bottom, leaving you to guess that you're now the size of the average Barbie Doll, if even that . . . and what's worse . . . Eddy had just shut the nursery door and engaged the door lock, trapping you in here with him!

"Mommy always too busy to play . . . but now as my new doll, all we ever do is play" Eddy says with a smile that was just as much mature and mischievous as it was young and childish!

You try to back away from the now towering toddler . . . but he soon has you cornered among the big toy blocks . . . he
11512111.title: Your baby boy is aiming his new Body Alteration...

115121111.content:
Eddy: heheheeheee . . . and this isn't the only thing my "toy" can do Mommy . . .

He grins impishly as he flicks and twists the different controls, engaging yet another program . . .

You try to dive for cover, but the big toddler just sweeps away any possible hiding spots away with a wobbling kick of his big foot.

You are left staring up at him as he pulls the trigger again!

This time as the light swallows you, you see that the gun was programmed for . . .
115121111.title: goes ahead and demonstrates another program for...

choices: Make your way to a different level.
115121112.content:
You tried to dive between your big baby's legs to freedom . . . but Eddy just flopped backwards and pined you with his giant crinkly diaper!

"Ha hahahah, Mommy not get away that easily!"

He holstered his Alteration Gun in his diaper cover's waistband and then reached back to pull you out from under him.

Then with you firmly in hand, he toddled over to a cleaner part of his nursery.

It was in this area that one of Eddy's favorite toys sat . . . his Doll House.

Having bought most of his toys yourself, you knew how well made the toy house was . . . or at least you thought you did!

The structure you were being carried to didn't look like the big two story plastic play set you and your husband had bought and spent several hours putting together for the kids so many Christmas's and Birthdays ago . . .

This house looked to be made of actual wood, stone, and steel! And far better detailed! In fact it, looking through the window at one of the rooms, it looked like something from a the Myazaki Movie, "The Secret World of Arriety!" From the windows alone, you guessed it must have at least ten different rooms on its three levels!

Eddy smiled rather proudly at your flabbergasted expression.

"Impressed, Mommy?" He lifted you up to eye level as he grins, "I made some improvements over the old original! Hope you enjoy it!"

And with that he pressed a hidden brick switch that opened one of the sides just enough for him to fit you inside and shut it back solid!

You shook your head after stumbling to your feet . . . your mind dizzy from all you'd just taken in . . . and were still taking in as you looked around!

You were standing in a hallway on the second floor of the Doll House. You were amazed at all the details around you . . . from the decorative paintings to the lights and "toy furniture" to the plush carpet beneath your feet . . . you would almost have thought your were in a fine English Manor house merged with a bit of the World's Fair's House of the Future display. But then you looked out one of the big bay windows and saw either your baby boy's giant diaper moving about or saw Eddy's giggling grin looking in on you.

Realizing you wouldn't be getting away easily . . . you decided to explore.
115121112.title: puts you in his personally made Doll House

choices: Climb up into the mysterious toy attic . . .
Descend and explore the main floor . . .
1151211122.content:
Moving along the homey second floor hallway you see several finely decorated bedrooms . . . and some strangely decorated.

As you approach the oaken-like stairwell leading down the main floor, you hand brushes a wall trigger and causes a more ricked looking set of steps to drop down from the sealing.

Looking up the steps you see a dimly lit space which you figure must be some kind of attic for the dollhouse. You see faint plumes which you mistake for "dust ghosts" . . . but you smell the faint hints of talcum powder coming from up there.

Looking over and down the landing by the stairs you can see the edges of a well lit and warm living room and other welcoming rooms.

Now which way should you go?
1151211122.title: Make your way to a different level.

choices: Toys your size and they were moving!
A doll house that looks exactly like the one you are in
11512111221.content: You decide that you will go into the toy attic I mean if this is so extravagant you are sure that the far upstairs will be as well. You walk up the creepy stairs and into the attic where there are boxes all around and some furniture. You were walking to the corner of the attic where you saw...
11512111221.title: Climb up into the mysterious toy attic . . .

choices: You shrunk again and fell into the dollhouse's dollhouse!
You heard a voice you didnt recognize
115121112212.content: You see another doll house up in the attic that look exactly like the one that you were in right now! "That is strange! First this house looks way too real and now it has another doll house in it" you think as you walk towards it. You soon reach it and bend down to look at it. It is exactly the same down to the dollhouse in the attic! "Ok this is strange!" you say trying to look at this doll house closer. That was when...
115121112212.title: A doll house that looks exactly like the one yo...

11512111222.content:
Holding on to the oaken railing for support, you make your way down the steps to the dollhouse's main floor. You just can't believe your eyes as you look around you.

This place looks like a southern or European manor home or a boarding house . . . with a foryar before the main door, a cozy and elegant sitting room, a homey a fully furnished living room, and through the doorways you can see what looks like a kitchen and maybe some other rooms you can't make out what they might be.

As you explore your new surroundings, you can feel the ground shivering rhythmically . . . reminding you that your giant baby boy Eddy was right outside playing in his room.

Shivering, still in shock from the idea of your precious little baby suddenly being so huge . . . you make your way . . .
11512111222.title: Descend and explore the main floor . . .

11512112.content:
You walk in and run right into a while wall.

It is soft and doesn't hurt you when you run into it.

You step back and realize that it is a giant diaper and that was when you saw it was Eddy's diaper.

He was huge and not only that he was...
11512112.title: Your baby boy is not quite so little anymore!!

choices: You manage to throw yourself clear to the side . . .
You are pinned against the closed door and are being swallowed by the diaper!
115121121.content:
You stare in shocked amazement as Eddy begins filling his huge diaper!

His farts are as loud as elephant trumpets and blow your hair back with hot gas that escapes the material. They even muffle your cries as the following sharts and poos rapidly fill the darkening diaper seat, causing it to swell like a balloon, pushing you back!

You try to step back, but Eddie is filling his diaper so quickly that it is over taking your feet! You hands sink in up to the wrists and then the elbows as you try to push back.

Desperately you struggle against the now brown blobbular barrier until . . .
115121121.title: Pooping the diaper

choices: His imposing size causes you to dive for cover . . .
You are spell bound by your big baby and don't move . . .
1151211211.content:
You land with a gasp for air on the plush carpet.

As you shake your head to clear it, you look up and get yet another surprise . . . the nursery has somehow gotten huge! All the furniture and things were the same, but the sheer space of the room was now cavernous! And as you look back at your baby boy Eddie, you realize that while the room was huge to you, it fit his new size perfectly!

You shake your head again as if dizzy, the differences in scale between you, the room, and your now giant baby boy making you feel like you just stepped through Alice's Looking Glass and entered some weird form of Wonderland.

But you have little time to ponder all this.

Eddie: Oh?! Is somebody back there?

You look up over the funky brown blockade of diaper that now pressed the nursery room door shut to see Eddie turning to look over his shoulder.
1151211211.title: You manage to throw yourself clear to the side ...

11512112111.content: Scared of what the newly enlarged Eddie might do to you, you decide to hide. You didn't have much time to think about where you were going to hide, so you hid in the first place you saw. That place was...
11512112111.title: His imposing size causes you to dive for cover ...

115121121111.content:
You dive into what you thought to be a big pile of clothes spilling from one of the many closets in the nursery room.

Peeking out from under the folds you see your big baby boy looks from one side to the next before just shrugging with a "no worries" smile and beginning to get up to his knees. You then watch in despair as Eddy then locks the door and moves a heavy chest of drawers over and presses it flush against it . . . you were effectively trapped!

As worry drives you to bury your face into the piles of cloth about you, you suddenly realize how strange the materials all feel. Fur, plush, satin, feathery . . . and then finding a large eye looking back at you reveals that what you thought was a huge pile of clothes, was in fact a great heap of giant empty plush toys! Each one the size of a full-body fur-suit!

The sound of Eddy getting up and toddling in your direction has you crawling into the nearest plush toy opening you can find!

Eddy notices the ruffling in his collection of huge unstuffed plush toys.

Eddy: So . . . I do have a visitor!

He shoves his big pudgy hands into the pile and begins feeling around

Eddy: Come out, come out . . . wherever you are.

You catch your gasp as the chubby digits find your waist and begins to pull you out . . . revealing your new disguise to be . . .
115121121111.title: Reader's Choice

1151211211112.content: A baggy, long fulled tailed Skunk plush?
1151211211112.title: Reader's choice

11512112111121.content:
Eddy lifts you up out of the pile of unfinished giant plushies and holds you out at arms length.

You can see your reflection in his big round eyes . . . and you see a floppy coat of velvety black with two big white stripes going down your back and along a big wide bushy tail.

Eddy: Oh, boy!

He tosses you up and catches you happily!

Eddy: I don't know who you are in there . . .
He snickers, making you wonder if he's actually telling the truth and maybe he does know who is hiding in this plushy skin . . .

Eddy: But I've always wanted a cute skunky to pway with!
He hugs you with surprising strength . . . but amazingly, it doesn't hurt at all . . . in fact you find it quite warm and cozy as he snuggles you. But then he holds you up again and looks a little disappointed . . .

What could be wrong?! You worry.
11512112111121.title: Yes!

choices: He packs you into a full figure plushie . . .
115121121111211.content:
You blanch with unseen fear, wondering what the giant baby was going to do.

But it doesn't take long for you to figure out as Eddy first puts you belly down on a play table . . . but instead of going for the giant bag of fiber filling that was kept in the closet with the stuff toys . . .

He was removing his hugely dirty diaper and folding it closed!

"Skunkies suppose to be stinky . . . but we fix that with these new scented pampers from last Christmas!"

He takes a deep sniff of his own diaper and giggles, "Hot cross buns . . . and soon Skunky have nice full buns!"

And with that he opens the back seem you crawled through and starts to stuff the mess filled diaper into the plushy with you!
115121121111211.title: "Skunky needs more stuffing"

11512112111122.content: A big baggy Teddy Bear skin?
11512112111122.title: Other/Reader's choice

11512112112.content:
You looked up to see that Eddie was turning his head to look over his shoulder. Hoping for the best, and also because you were too afraid to make any movements, you stood frozen to your spot. You thought that you may be small enough that Eddie wouldn't notice you at his newly enlarged form.

Eddie continues to turn his head and survey the area behind him. Watching him look made you worry even more. If Eddie finds out you're in the room with him and he catches you, there's no telling what he may do to you. That being said, does Eddie find you, and if so what does he do to you?
11512112112.title: You are spell bound by your big baby and don...

choices: Your mother's love wins out and you approach him . . .
You instinctive fear takes hold and you try to flee . . .
115121121121.content:
As you stare up at your giant baby boy, your motherly instincts can't help but think about how cute and cuddlier he's gotten . . . despite the fear of his increased size.

Then Eddy looks down and locks eyes with you! You see a mix of the same old childish innocence you've always known--which makes your heart flutter with awe--and a hint of cunning intellect that further fuels your fears.

Eddy: Mommy!

Hearing his rich but still cheery and childish voice cry out with joy almost melts your heart out of the chilling fear . . .

Eddy: I taught I heard somebody come in . . . but I wasn't sure over the sound of my filling my diapee!

He giggles as she slaps the huge browning sack wrapping about his rump, giving off a loud mushy smack and rippling under his pudgy palm.
Eddy then leans forward, turns, and starts to crawl toward you.

Eddy: And speaking of which . . . it seems I'm in need of a change . . .
115121121121.title: Yes (Reader's Choice)

1151211211211.content:
Being the loving mother that you are, you feel compelled to change his diaper, regardless of how big and messy it is. Eddy is happy to see this as he gently picks you up and takes you over to a corner of the room where his changing table is. Eddy then grabs wipes, powder and a new diaper suited to his size. You then ask him to lie down. He does so and you began to change him.

Moving to one side of him, you go and undo the one side of his diaper. Being so big, Eddy then picks you up to go to the other side and do the same thing. Once done with that, he places you on his belly. You get the front of the diaper to fall down and it lands with a loud squishing sound. Next,you hop off of your giant son and proceed to pull the diaper out from under him. Once you manage to pull it out of the way, you go and get the cleaning supplies.

You go up to Eddy and ask him to lift his legs up. You get the wipes and and powder and start cleaning your giant baby's butt. After that, you get the new diaper that looks more like a deflated hot air balloon at your size. You put it underneath and tell Eddy he can drop his legs now. The resulting boom feels like a mini earthquake. Eddy picks you up to re-tape the sides of his new diaper.

Eddy then puts you the ground and begins to stand to his new full height. You couldn't help but gaze up at your giant baby boy as he was admiring how great his new diaper looked and felt on him. Just then he looked down at you and the two of you locked eyes. Eddy's face was showing that he just as impressed as you were at changing him, but there was also something more. A look of appreciation appeared on his face, because even he realized how difficult it must have been to complete this ordinarily simple task.

"Tank you mommy." Eddy manages to finally say. "You're welcome Eddy" you reply, "There isn't anything I wouldn't do for you, because that's how much I love you." Eddy was happy to hear you say that, because now he has other plans for you. What happens next?
1151211211211.title: Your mother's love wins out and you approac...

11512112112111.content:
"Can I pway with you, mommy?" Eddy asks. "Why of course, my big little boy!" you respond.

What does he want to play?
11512112112111.title: Reader's Choice

choices: Pouches you in the front of his diaper cover
Carries you over to wardrobe hidden behind his toy cabinets.
115121122.content:
You know the nursery was huge because you always wanted a big family with lots of little ones . . . but now it seemed more like a nice size bedroom compared to Eddie's new size . . . which was easily three times yours!

You take another step back as Eddie now turns to look at you!

Eddie: Oh! I was wondering when you were coming up Mommy!

He begins to reach for you, and in it fit of surprised panic you run back out the door and try make a break down the hall! But Eddie just thrusts his arm through the door and grabs you by the blouse and drags you back in!

Eddie: Now where do you think you're going?!
He chuckles as he shuts the door. He holds you up under your arms . . . your roles seemingly reverse as he giggles and chastises you.

Eddie: Naughty Mommy mustn't try to run away!
He plops you over his thick thigh
Eddie: Eddie Spank!
And spank you he does! Smacking his big pudgy hand against your pants seat like it was a tamberine!

You try to scold him, but the surprising strength and playful force of his swats soon has your breaking down into tears!

Eddie: Oh, it okay Mommy
He says as he lifts you back up and hugs you to his shoulder, stroking your back.

Eddie: Now we gonna have some fun!

and he . . .
115121122.title: Turning around to see you

choices: Is pointing a shrink ray at you
Is about to drink a growth potion
11522.content: You are 16-year-old Molly; you have just gotten home from high school, and your mom has asked you to change your 2-year-old brother Eddy's diaper. You open the door to his room, only to find, to your shock and terror, that Eddy....
11522.title: Molly

115221.content:
You are 16-year-old Molly; you have just gotte
home from high school, and your mom has
asked you to change your 2-year-old brother
Eddy's diaper. You open the door to his room,
only to find, to your shock and terror, that Eddy
was now somehow 10 feet tall.




There stood Eddy having outgrown his
diaper and clothes holding his baby bottle
confused yet curious about his predicament.


He was standing in the middle of his playpen
which he could now easily get out of.


You return to your senses and react.

“MOM COME QUICK WE GOT A PROBLEM”

Your mom came running.

“What’s the problem Molly and
OH MY GOD WHAT HAPPENED To
Eddie”


The panic was interrupted as Mom’s
cell phone rang.


“Hello Amanda now isn’t a good time”


“You’re telling me! Listen when we
bumped into each other earlier I think
our bottles got mixed up.”


“Amanda I’m not worried about baby bottles
right now”


“But you should be. Listen you can’t let
Eddie drink what’s in that bottle”


“Huh? Why not?”

“It’s top secret but dangerous”


“Wait are you saying that that’s why
my little boy changed”


“Changed? Wait you mean he drank it”


“I think just a sip”


“Oh no this isn’t good. That bottle contains
a highly concentrated growth serum”


Next_____
115221.title: Is now 10 feet tall

choices: Right infront of Eddys poopy diaper and man does it stink!
115222.content: You walk in and see Eddy sitting on the ground with a full poopy diaper pointing what looks like a play gun at you. You have seen enough science fiction shows to know that it is a ray gun. You try talking to your little brother "hi Eddy how about you put the gun down and let your big sister help you with that poopy diaper". "No, I want sissy small" Eddy says shooting the gun and hitting you. You saw the room getting bigger around you, including Eddy. Then you pass out. You wake up...

You moan and shake your head to clear the dizziness, only to find yourself the size of an action figure in your baby brother's pudgy and surprisingly powerful hand!

Eddy: Wakey wakey, wittle sissy!
He says with a hearty giggle and an impish gleam in his young eyes.

Molly: Eddy?! What . . . what did you just do?!
You squirm in his grasp, shocked at how drastically your size situation had changed.

Eddy: Wike I said Sissy! I made you smaller . . .
He waves his Size Gun in front of you, showing that it wasn't just some toy but real metal and electrodes a sparking and gleaming in his hand.
Eddy: Now then . . .

choices: Something taps you on the shoulder

As you walk around...
11522212.title: He drops you into the play room's Doll House.

115222121.content: You turn around and see that the person who tapped you on the shoulder was....
115222121.title: Something taps you on the shoulder

1152221212.content: Who is shrunken with you?
1152221212.title: Another shrunken person?

choices: little molly is going in the diaper.
little molly is going to change my diaper
1152222.content: You wake up right in front of a white and brown wall. You look up to see Eddy looking down at you. "AHHHH" you scream as you move away from the diaper. "Oh my gosh Eddy your diaper is so stinky" you said to your now giant baby brother. "I know I like it" Eddy says. He then says...
1152222.title: Right infront of Eddys poopy diaper and man doe...

11522222.content: "Little molly is going to change my diaper" Eddy said as he grabbed her and shook her a bit. "Now go molly" he said looking at her. Molly responds with...
11522222.title: little molly is going to change my diaper

choices: Accidentally knocks Molly into his old diaper . . .
115222222.content:
Molly squeaks her consent as she nods, tears forming in her eyes from being shaken.

Eddy sets her down at his side as he sits down with a loud squelsh on the changing mat. The towering toddler puts his hands behind his head as he leans back and watches his now "little" sister.

With nervous hands, Molly climbs up Eddy's side and takes hold of the first diaper tab. Using her weight and gravity she jump/pulls the tab loose and drags it down to the floor. She then proceeds to make her way around to the other side, being careful not to get brained by Eddy's big feet as he lazily kicks them. With a little more effort, Molly manages to undo the other tab, causing the diaper front to fall loose . . . and releasing the full force of the trapped fumes! Molly coughs and gags at the smell as the diaper falls open . . . but not wanting to make Eddy upset with her, she manages to hold her breath and her lunch down as she drags the old diaper out from under him.

Eddy, meanwhile, reaches up to the nearby changing table's supply drawers and pulls out a fresh diaper and powder. He then makes Molly open the fresh diaper herself and push it under his lifted tush. Eddy then proceeds to shake so much baby powder into the fresh diaper that it creates a thick fog all about poor Molly.

Molly coughs and stumbles about blindly in the dusty cloud as her giant baby brother closes and tapes his new diaper into place comfortably.

Finished with his change, Eddy hops up quickly and . . .
115222222.title: Giant Diaper Change

choices: Eddy toddles across the room [forgetting about her/you for the moment]
Eddy looks down at her/you with a grin
1152222222.content:
Molly--you--tumbles over from the sudden huge bump from behind.

She coughs to clear the rest of the powder from her throat, but soon gags as a strong smell fills her nose and lungs . . . just seconds before coming to a stop in something warm and gooey under her jeans.

Very carefully, Molly clears her eyes and looks around . . . and almost looses her lunch as she realizes that she's sitting in, almost sticking to, the big load of poo in Eddy's old diaper seat!

As she struggles to try and get to her feet . . .
1152222222.title: Accidentally knocks Molly into his old diaper ....

choices: He picks up the whole diaper and dumps you into his new fresh one
He pulls out his Size Gun and uses it on her.
11522222222.content:
Eddy: well, well, well . ..

He puts his pudgy hands on his padded hips and cocks his brow at the sight of you.

Eddy: Look who's gone and gotten into my old poopie pamper! Does big sissy like big diapers like her now Big Baby bro?

"No!" you cry out before coughing and gagging at the smell.

Eddy: well let's see if we can't fix that!
11522222222.title: Eddy looks down at her/you with a grin

115222222221.content:
You try to scream as your are sent tumbling head over heels into Eddy's stretched open diaper front,

But you quickly clamp shut to avoid getting a mouthful of poo as you land sprawling into the fresh padding of his new diaper.

Eddie tosses his old diaper into the waste hamper and then does a little shimmy to shake all the reloaded mess into position in the rear,

Leaving your sitting dizzy in the front, just under his crotch.

Eddy: Big Sissy always been good babysitter, but never understood what fun it is to be diapered. Maybe spending the day in one will open you up to it!

You try to scream, but Eddy just snaps the band back, sealing you inside.
115222222221.title: He picks up the whole diaper and dumps you into...

115222222222.content:
You stare up in fright as Eddy draws his Size Gun back out and point it down at you once again.

But how is it set?
115222222222.title: He pulls out his Size Gun and uses it on her.

1152222222221.content: The gun is set to shrink and he fires at you. You watch as you baby brother begins to get bigger and bigger still! You even sees the walls of his poopy pamper get taller and taller. Eddy stops shrinking you . "How do you like my giant diaper now littler sissy Molly" Eddy's giant booming voice says. "HELP" you scream which is like a squeak to your giant baby brother.
1152222222221.title: Even smaller big sister

choices: And plucks her out of his old diaper
and picks up the whole diaper
11522222222211.content:
Eddy does not let his now tiny 'big' sister's cries go unanswered.

He smiles mischievously as he reach down . . .
11522222222211.title: Eddy reaches for her

choices: says ok I will grow you
115222222222112.content: Eddy grabs his whole poopy diaper and lifts it to his face so he could get a better look at you. "Hey little big sister" he says evily. "Change me back Eddy" you beg. "Hummmmmm I didnt hear a magic word" he says back. "Please" you ask. Eddy looks in at you in his old diaper and...
115222222222112.title: picks up the whole diaper

choices: Your clothes didn't grow back with you
11522222222212.content:
Eddy chuckles as he resets his invention.

"Okay wittle sister, I hear you."

He makes a few adjustments to the gun's settings and then aims it down into the diaper.

As the beam baths you in its light, you feel your body begin to heat up as it starts to expand outward and upward.

Soon you are back to your previous shrunken size . . .

And you keep on growing! Eddy must be returning you to normal, you hope.

But then . . . you stop . . . just short of Eddy's belly button!

And that's not all!
11522222222212.title: Eddy aims the gun again!

You can feel the poop on your back and you begin to tear up. Eddy looks down at you smiling big and giggling to himself. Eddy then says
115222222222121.title: Your clothes didn't grow back with you

You windmill your arms to try and steady yourself, but the moments only serve to tatter your already size-shifted-strained clothes! Eddy playfully tries to help by grabbing hold of your top . . . but the whole outfit tears . . .

And you fall right back into the big diaper . . . the pile of warm mushy poo now so big it acted like a sticky cushion to your lower back as your shoulders hit the soft carpet.

Eddy just chuckles as he tweeks the dials on his gun.

Here are the giant babies to choose from:

Lucas, a 3-year-old boy who is thrilled at being the bigger one for a change.

Emily, a 2-year-old girl who gets what she wants or else!

Ned, a 2-year-old boy who loves to destroy things and have power over grown-ups.

Anna, a 4-year-old girl who wants to be princess of the world and rule over adults.

Now then here's an interactive story of my own that's set within the adventures with giant babies universe entitled the big fat baby giant sized edition starring yours truly as an ordinary big fat baby who becomes a gentle yet somewhat playfully destructive but not malicious fat giant baby. Enjoy!

Once upon a time I was but an ordinary big fat baby who at least weighed 500 pounds and always wore an extra large diaper with yellow straps on it around my waist, until something happened to me while I was outside.

On that fateful day, I experienced a giant growth spurt of some sort as I grew at least 100 feet tall until my spurt stopped as I noticed my giant self and whatnot.

"I don't believe it! I'm a giant baby in other words a fat giant baby but after all I'm still a good fat giant baby. Now what can a fat giant baby like me do to have some fun? I know I'll.....

And claim the 1st slot myself

151.content:
Okay so if anyone here has ever
seen or heard of the cartoon short
“King Sized Canary”

The premise involves a bottle of
“Jumbo Gro” meant for plants
but somehow a cat feeds it to a starved small
sickly canary and the few inch tall bird
grows to like 12 feet tall and no longer sickly


Later other animals join.


—————
————————-

Kinda made a modified version elsewhere
But here’s the twist or just.


A toddler or baby somehow finds
and or drinks the Jumbo Gro instead
of milk or juice and of course grows
Additional ones can drink too

Here’s the twist. If they’re holding the
bottle when they grow the bottle grows
bigger with them also somehow the

after each drink or spill.

So have at.
151.title: Jumbo Grow Junior Jr - reserved-

info.brief_description: What happens when babies and toddlers are bigger than their parents and older siblings?
info.description:
What happens when babies and toddlers are the bigger ones for a change?

RULES:
-No descriptions of blood or gore
-No sex involving minors
-No swearing
-The babies are playful and may be destructive, but they can't be actively malicious unless their is a reason for it
-Other than that, GO NUTS!
